◆ eActiveWithMCU

am_hal_pwrctrl_sram_select_e am_hal_pwrctrl_sram_memcfg_t::eActiveWithMCU

Activate SRAM when the MCU is active.

For each of the eActiveWithXxx settings: AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_NONE = This component has no association with SSRAM. AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_1M_GRP0 = Group1 ignored by this component. Group0 is active when this component is powered on. AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_1M_GRP1 = Group0 ignored by this component. Group1 is active when this component is powered on. AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_ALL = All SRAM active when this component is powered on.

◆ eSRAMCfg

am_hal_pwrctrl_sram_select_e am_hal_pwrctrl_sram_memcfg_t::eSRAMCfg

SRAM banks to enable.

◆ eSRAMRetain

am_hal_pwrctrl_sram_select_e am_hal_pwrctrl_sram_memcfg_t::eSRAMRetain

Retain SRAM in deep sleep. For SRAM retention: AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_NONE = Retain all SRAM in deepsleep. AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_1M_GRP0 = Retain Group0, power down Group1 in deepsleep. AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_1M_GRP1 = Retain Group1, power down Group0 in deepsleep. AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_SRAM_ALL = Retain all SRAM in deepsleep.
